channel.title: Projects on Portfolio website for Shengwei Lai
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Portfolio website for Shengwei Lai

item.title: Arrivals at tourist accommodation establishments
item.description: Euro yield curves get data download data from Eurostat tour_occ_arm <- get_eurostat(id="tour_occ_arm") glimpse(tour_occ_arm) ## Rows: 216,654 ## Columns: 6 ## $ c_resid <chr> "FOR", "FOR", "FOR", "FOR", "FOR", "FOR", "FOR", "FOR", "FO... ## $ unit <chr> "NR", "NR", "NR", "NR", "NR", "NR", "NR", "NR", "NR", "NR",... ## $ nace_r2 <chr> "I551", "I551", "I551", "I551", "I551", "I551", "I551", "I5... ## $ geo <chr> "BG", "CH", "ES", "FI", "HR", "HU", "IS", "LI", "LV", "NL",.

item.title: Euro yield curve
item.description: Euro yield curves get data download data from Eurostat yield_curve <- get_eurostat(id="irt_euryld_m") yield_curve$maturity <- factor(yield_curve$maturity, ordered = TRUE, levels = c("Y1","Y2","Y3","Y4","Y5","Y6","Y7","Y8","Y9","Y10", "Y11","Y12","Y13","Y14","Y15","Y16","Y17","Y18","Y19", "Y20","Y21","Y22","Y23","Y24","Y25","Y26","Y27","Y28", "Y29","Y30")) #order maturity glimpse(yield_curve) ## Rows: 34,740 ## Columns: 6 ## $ yld_curv <chr> "INS_FWD", "INS_FWD", "INS_FWD", "INS_FWD", "INS_FWD", "IN... ## $ bonds <chr> "CGB_EA", "CGB_EA", "CGB_EA", "CGB_EA", "CGB_EA", "CGB_EA"... ## $ maturity <ord> Y1, Y10, Y11, Y12, Y13, Y14, Y15, Y16, Y17, Y18, Y19, Y2, .

item.title: Gas price
item.description: gas price in Europe get data download data from Eurostat gas_price <- get_eurostat(id="nrg_pc_202") glimpse(gas_price) ## Rows: 42,160 ## Columns: 8 ## $ product <chr> "4100", "4100", "4100", "4100", "4100", "4100", "4100", "4... ## $ consom <chr> "4141901", "4141901", "4141901", "4141901", "4141901", "41... ## $ unit <chr> "GJ_GCV", "GJ_GCV", "GJ_GCV", "GJ_GCV", "GJ_GCV", "GJ_GCV"... ## $ tax <chr> "I_TAX", "I_TAX", "I_TAX", "I_TAX", "I_TAX", "I_TAX", "I_T... ## $ currency <chr> "EUR", "EUR", "EUR", "EUR", "EUR", "EUR", "EUR", "EUR", "E.

item.title: selected stocks in China A-share market
item.description: myStocks get data get stock prices of 7 China A-share companies and Shanghai Stock Exchange (SSE) Composite Index using tidyquant package myStocks <- c("600519.SS", "000651.SZ", "601318.SS", "600276.SS", "600585.SS", "000002.SZ", "600009.SS", "601398.SS", "002594.SZ", "000001.SS") %>% tq_get(get = "stock.prices", from = "2015-01-01", to = "2020-09-30") %>% group_by(symbol) name <- data.frame(name = c("Moutai", "Gree", "PingAn", "Hengrui", "Conch Cement", "Vanke", "Shanghai Airport", "ICBC", "BYD", "SSE Index"), symbol = c("600519.SS", "000651.SZ", "601318.SS", "600276.SS", "600585.SS", "000002.
